query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `student_points` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `studentId` int NOT NULL,
  `totalPoints` int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `streak` int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `lastActivityDate` date,
  `belt` varchar(20) DEFAULT 'white',
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4EmYiUJsZhACerp.0e9436e27250 --database c6FhCpifoFzEQqXNtsKEU6 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `student_points` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `studentId` int NOT NULL,
  `totalPoints` int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `streak` int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `lastActivityDate` date,
  `belt` varchar(20) DEFAULT 'white',
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
